posts.post_content:
A very neat item & sidepiece addition to your collection in very good condition for being approximately 130 years old, give or take.


Some other examples that went at auction:

REA (2) $720:
[url]https://bid.robertedwardauctions.com...e?itemid=42405[/url]

REA (3) $1972
[url]https://bid.robertedwardauctions.com...ce?itemid=4321[/url]

Lelands (1) $937:
[url]https://auction.lelands.com/bids/bidplace?itemid=76635[/url]

Lelands (2) $852:
[url]https://auction.lelands.com/bids/bidplace?itemid=75748[/url]

Lelands (1) $640:
[url]https://auction.lelands.com/bids/bidplace?itemid=74050[/url]

Have not seen one come up in the past few years at these 2 auction houses, get a deal here on a nice 19th century item, looks even better in person.


$200 Shipped
Damn!  What a cool item… sorry I missed this
I need it to finish my set of these - musta gone fast. I'll offer up 300.00 if the buyer is interested....
looking for this pencil box! The one sold here or any of the same image.

I was the purchaser of this pencil box. 

I also needed it for the complete set of 3, so thanks again Paul. 
I think the price was a real deal. 

Sorry Henry, I won’t part with this item, and as you’re also chasing the set, I think you can understand why. :)

... I’d love to see yours though if you have any interest in posting them, thanks.
